str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Only, solitary, desolate. Probably from meno; remaining, i.e. Sole or single; by implication, mere.
True (lit: made of truth), real, genuine. From alethes; truthful.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From apo and stello; set apart, i.e. to send out literally or figuratively.
